sources.title: East Of Borneo
sources.description: 1931 jungle picture - a woman searches the jungles for her husband, who has gone somewhat Kurtzy.

sources.title: East of Borneo (1931)
sources.description: Mrs. Linda Randolph treks through darkened jungles to the land of Maradu to find her missing husband Allan, who'd left her years before when he believed she was in love with another. She finds Allan the drunken court physician to a devious prince-- Whose designs on the pair don't include a happy ending. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/east-of-borneo-1931/

sources.title: East of Borneo (1931) JUNGLE ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Rose Hobart, Charles Bickford, Georges Renavent 
Director: George Melford

Woman treks through jungle to find her missing husband!

metadata.Plot: Woman treks through jungle to find her missing husband, who had left her years before when he believed she was having an affair. She finds him as the drunken court physician to a tyrannical jungle prince; as if that isn't bad enough, she soon realizes the the prince has eyes for her.
metadata.Writer: Dale Van Every, Edwin H. Knopf
metadata.Actors: Rose Hobart, Charles Bickford, Georges Renavent
